verses.name: Genesis 9:18
verses.text: And the sons of Noah, that went forth of the ark, were Shem, and Ham, and Japheth: and Ham is the father of Canaan.

verses.name: Genesis 9:19
verses.text: These are the three sons of Noah: and of them was the whole earth overspread.

verses.name: Genesis 9:20
verses.text: And Noah began to be an husbandman, and he planted a vineyard:

verses.name: Genesis 9:21
verses.text: And he drank of the wine, and was drunken; and he was uncovered within his tent.

verses.name: Genesis 9:22
verses.text: And Ham, the father of Canaan, saw the nakedness of his father, and told his two brethren without.
